fields_of_interest: Budget, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Innovation for global health research and development primarily in Horizon2020 and FP9.
organisation_name: Global Alliance for Tuberculosis Drug Development (TB Alliance)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
position: Senior Vice President for External Affairs
relevant_communication: World TB Day activities around innovation in TB research
goals__remit: TB Alliance is a not-for-profit organization dedicated to the discovery and development of better, faster-acting, and affordable tuberculosis drugs that are available to those who need them.
